docs.lead_paragraph: The attorney for a Florida woman who fled with her son to avoid his circumcision says she has been arrested.

headline.main: Federal Complaint Dismissed Over Florida Boy's Circumcision
headline.print_headline: Federal Complaint Dismissed Over Florida Boy's Circumcision

headline.main: Is Your Child Your Excuse to Buy an Apple Watch?

docs.abstract: The Apple Watch does exactly what I wanted it to do: helps me to connect when I need to, and disconnect when I don’t.
docs.snippet: The Apple Watch does exactly what I wanted it to do: helps me to connect when I need to, and disconnect when I don’t.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown is proposing a record $115.3 billion California spending plan that will send more money to public schools, set aside reserves and create a new state tax credit for the working poor.

headline.main: Brown's Budget Boosts Spending for Schools, Adds Tax Credit
headline.print_headline: Brown's Budget Boosts Spending for Schools, Adds Tax Credit

docs.snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown is proposing a record $115.3 billion California spending plan that will send more money to public schools, set aside reserves and create a new state tax credit for the working poor.

docs.lead_paragraph: The measure is almost certain to be blocked by Democrats in the Senate.

headline.main: House Approves Revised Measure Banning Most Abortions After 20 Weeks
headline.print_headline: House Approves Revised Measure Banning Most Abortions After 20 Weeks

docs.abstract: House votes, 242-to-184, to ban most abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, approving revised version of earlier Republican-introduced bill; bill is not expected to pass Senate, making vote largely symbolic gesture.
docs.snippet: The measure is almost certain to be blocked by Democrats in the Senate.

docs.lead_paragraph: The 242-184 roll call Wednesday by which the House passed a bill banning most abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy.

headline.main: House Roll Call: Banning Most Late-Term Abortions
headline.print_headline: House Roll Call: Banning Most Late-Term Abortions

docs.snippet: The 242-184 roll call Wednesday by which the House passed a bill banning most abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy.

headline.main: At Frieze, Artists’ Trash Is Collectors’ Treasure

docs.abstract: Bidoun’s fair at the booth will sell ephemera including Tony Shafrazi’s pill bottles, Hal Foster’s Tic Tacs and Wade Guyton’s old Nikes.
docs.snippet: Bidoun’s fair at the booth will sell ephemera including Tony Shafrazi’s pill bottles, Hal Foster’s Tic Tacs and Wade Guyton’s old Nikes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans are predicting House passage of a late-term abortion ban which omits rape provisions that angered female GOP lawmakers and forced party leaders to drop an earlier version of the bill.

headline.main: House Approves GOP Bill Banning Most Late-Term Abortions
headline.print_headline: House Approves GOP Bill Banning Most Late-Term Abortions

docs.snippet: Republicans are predicting House passage of a late-term abortion ban which omits rape provisions that angered female GOP lawmakers and forced party leaders to drop an earlier version of the bill.

docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in North Carolina, one of several states looking to mandate lengthier and stricter delays for abortions, are hearing pushback as they say forcing women to wait 72 hours is not too great an imposition.

headline.main: U.S. Women Face Harder Path to Abortion as States Extend Waiting Periods
headline.print_headline: U.S. Women Face Harder Path to Abortion as States Extend Waiting Periods

docs.snippet: Lawmakers in North Carolina, one of several states looking to mandate lengthier and stricter delays for abortions, are hearing pushback as they say forcing women to wait 72 hours is not too great an imposition.

docs.lead_paragraph: The family of a 19-year-old Indian girl has been ostracized and fined 1.6 million rupees ($25,000) by a village council after she rejected a marriage arranged when she was a baby, the girl and her parents said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Indian Child Bride, Now 19, Faces $25,000 Fine for Rejecting Marriage
headline.print_headline: Indian Child Bride, Now 19, Faces $25,000 Fine for Rejecting Marriage

docs.snippet: The family of a 19-year-old Indian girl has been ostracized and fined 1.6 million rupees ($25,000) by a village council after she rejected a marriage arranged when she was a baby, the girl and her parents said on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: An Arizona woman was charged with fraud and identity theft after faking cancer to get the state to pay for her late-term abortion five years ago, prosecutors said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Arizona Prosecutors Charge Woman Who Faked Cancer
headline.print_headline: Arizona Prosecutors Charge Woman Who Faked Cancer

docs.snippet: An Arizona woman was charged with fraud and identity theft after faking cancer to get the state to pay for her late-term abortion five years ago, prosecutors said on Tuesday.
